column4: BRIEF-Snap-On Says Planned 2020 In-Person Annual Meeting Of Shareholders Moved To Virtual Meeting
column6: * SNAP-ON - WILL MOVE IN 2020 FROM ORIGINALLY PLANNED IN-PERSON ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS AT CO’S HEADQUARTERS TO VIRTUAL MEETING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-Snap Says Stuart Bowers Will Be Leaving Co To Join Tesla
column6: * SNAP INC SAYS STUART BOWERS WILL BE LEAVING SNAP ON FRIDAY, MAY 25, TO JOIN TESLA AS A LEADER ON THEIR AUTOPILOT ENGINEERING TEAM
column7: * SNAP INC SAYS NIMA KHAJEHNOURI WILL SERVE AS ACTING LEAD FOR CO’S MONETIZATION ENGINEERING DEPARTMENT Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-Snap-On Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $2.82

column7: * Q1 SALES $935.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $926.8 MILLION
